abstract: The fiscal cliff in the United States, the European debt crisis and the slowdown in China’s economy have all weighed down deal-making. Our inaugural conference, “DealBook: Opportunities for Tomorrow,” explored these challenges and possibilities.
snippet: The fiscal cliff in the United States, the European debt crisis and the slowdown in China’s economy have all weighed down deal-making. Our inaugural conference, “DealBook: Opportunities for Tomorrow,” explored these challenges and possibilities.

byline.original: By Eric Owles, Michael J. de la Merced and William Alden
